The above is checked against the Qinglongsi edition.
The original record says:
On the twenty-third day of the third month of the second year of Zhenyuan, I finished copying the book of my late master at the quiet window of Jilefang.
One proofread, it is said.
On the fifteenth day of the second month of the second year of Wen'an, I finished copying it at Guanyin Temple using the original copy from Baoen Temple.
On the fifteenth day of the fifth month of the second year of Wen'an, Vajra disciple Xuanqing finished copying it at Mufan using the original copy from the residence of the Great Master.
Vajra Zixi, Cheng Chan, said: Those who seek the formless should advance, and this book should not be taken out. It is said to be a secret treasury.
